channel.title: Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18982)
item.content:encoded:
Twitter @surjdenver was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=surjdenver&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere
item.author: SURJ Denver

item.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado's Solidarity Meals Program just...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver is feeling grateful at Metro Caring. · Denver

Sanctuary4All Colorado's Solidarity Meals Program just KEEPS ON GIVING!! Gaby is selling Pozole and Cheesecake this weekend! Pozole is a delicious, festive soup perfect for a chilly winter evening. Pickup in Denver on Saturday 12/18 from 1PM to 3PM at 1100 E. 18th Ave 80218. Please consider supporting Gaby and her family now by placing your order at solidaritymeals.paperform.co

Image Description: Blue background with white text
“Solidarity Meals from Gaby
Pozole Verde con ...Pollo - $15 - Traditional soup made with hominy, green chile, assorted vegetables, and chicken, served with tostadas
Pozole Rojo con Puerco - $15 - Traditional soup made with hominy, red chiles, assorted vegetables, and pork, served with tostadas
Tarta de Queso - $5 - Slice of cheesecake
solidaritymeals.paperform.co
Pickup at 1100 E. 18th Ave Metro Caring
December 18, 1:00-3:00
Venmo @Gabriela-Miranda-42
Instagram logo @sanctuary4allco
Twitter logo @sanctuary4allco
Facebook logo Sanctuary4All Colorado”

See more
item.author: SURJ Denver

item.title: Yessenia from Sanctuary4All Colorado is cooking her delicious...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Yessenia from Sanctuary4All Colorado is cooking her delicious Tamales, Pozole, Chocoflan, and Ponche for everyone this holiday season! All funds go directly to her and her family. Pick up on Saturday December 25th, 1PM to 3PM at 1100 E. 18th Ave. Go to https://christmassolidaritymeals.paperform.co/ to order! Last day to order is Thursday December 23rd.

Image Description 1: White background with red text and black Christmas tree
“Sanctuary 4 All Christmas Tamales
Verdes con P...ollo - $24 - filled with salsa verde and chicken
Rojos con Puerco - $24 - filled with salsa roja and pork
Rajas con Queso - $24 - filled with peppers, onions, and cheese
Last Day to order is Dec. 23
Pickup in Denver on Dec. 25 from 1:00-3:00
christmassolidaritymeals.paperform.co
Venmo @yessenia-martinez-25”

Image Description 2: White background with red text and black Christmas tree
“Sanctuary 4 All Pozole & Dessert
Chicken Pozole Verde -$15 - Soup made with chicken, tomatillos, hominy, radishes, and lime
Pork Pozole Rojo - $15 - Soup made with pork, tomatoes, hominy, radishes, and lime
Chocoflan - $25 - Chocolate cake topped with flan
Ponche - $15 - Warm spiced fruit punch
Last Day to order is Dec. 23
Pickup in Denver on Dec. 25 from 1:00-3:00
christmassolidaritymeals.paperform.co
Venmo @yessenia-martinez-25”

item.title: Lupe from Sanctuary4All Colorado is making Gorditas, Guiso de...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Lupe from Sanctuary4All Colorado is making Gorditas, Guiso de Chile, Flan, and Spring Fling Cupcakes this weekend!! We love all of Lupe's food and are especially big fans of her Spring Fling Cupcakes! Pickup in Denver on Saturday 12/11 from 1PM to 3PM at 1100 E. 18th Ave 80218. Please support Lupe by ordering now! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co/

Image Description 1: Cream colored background with menu
“Solidarity Meals from Lupe
Gorditas de Rajas con Queso - $15 - Veget...arian green pepper & cheese gorditas served with rice, beans, salad & salsa
Gorditas de Puerco con Chile Colorado - $15 - Pork gorditas in a red chile sauce served with rice, beans, salad & salsa
Guiso de Chile Colorado - $15 - Pork stew in red chile sauce served with rice, beans & tortilla
solidaritymeals.paperform.co
Pickup in Denver
December 11, 1:00-3:00
Venmo @guadalupe-carmona-4
Instagram logo @sanctuary4allco
Twitter logo @sanctuary4allco
Facebook logo Sanctuary4All Colorado”

Image Description 2: Cream colored background with menu
“Dessert from Lupe
Flan (Family Size) - $20 - Egg-based dessert cake
Spring Fling Cupcakes - $5 each - Zucchini-based sweet cupcakes
solidaritymeals.paperform.co
Pickup in Denver
December 11, 1:00-3:00
Venmo @guadalupe-carmona-4
Instagram logo @sanctuary4allco
Twitter logo @sanctuary4allco
Facebook logo Sanctuary4All Colorado”

item.title: Yessenia from Sanctuary4All Colorado is making Pupusas, Flan,...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver is at Metro Caring. · Denver

Yessenia from Sanctuary4All Colorado is making Pupusas, Flan, and Chocoflan this weekend!! We have tried all of these from Yessenia and they are absolutely DELICIOUS. Please support her and her beautiful family by ordering now! Pickup in Denver on Saturday 12/4 from 1PM to 3PM at 1100 E. 18th Ave 80218. https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co/

Image Descriptions:

Image 1: Gray and pink graphic background with menu...
"Solidarity Meals from Yessenia
Pupusa Frijol con Queso - $3.75 A thick flatbread made with masa & stuffed with beans & cheese. Served with curtido and salsa roja.
Pupusa Chicharron con Queso - $3.75 A thick flatbread made with masa & stuffed with chicharrones & cheese. Served with curtido and salsa roja.
Flan - $5 A creamy baked custard dessert topped with caramel
Chocoflan (Family Size) - $25 Half flan half chocolate cake

solidaritymeals.paperform.co
Pickup in Denver Metro Caring
December 4, 1:00-3:00
Venmo @yessenia-martinez-25
Instagram logo @sanctuary4allco
Twitter logo @sanctuary4allco
Facebook logo Sanctuary4All Colorado"

Image 2: Pupusas with salsa

Image 3: Chocoflan

Image 4: Yessenia, her baby, and other Sanctuary for All members cooking in the kitchen at Metro Caring

item.title: The Indigenous Solidarity Network has developed this toolkit...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

The Indigenous Solidarity Network has developed this toolkit geared for white folks to discuss settler privilege and Thanksgiving with family, friends, and broader community.

INDIGENOUS SOLIDARITY NETWORK RETHINKING “THANKSGIVING” TOOLKIT Artwork by Kandi White, Indigenous Environmental Network, CultureStrike and Micah Bazant INTRODUCTION For many Indigenous People, giving thanks is a way of life. Among the Haudenushonne (Iroquois) Nations an opening address, or...

docs.google.com

Rethinking Thanksgiving Toolkit

INDIGENOUS SOLIDARITY NETWORK RETHINKING “THANKSGIVING” TOOLKIT Artwork by Kandi White, Indigenous Environmental Network, CultureStrike and Micah Bazant INTRODUCTION For many Indigenous People, giving thanks is a way of life. Among the Haudenushonne (Iroquois) Nations an opening address, or...INDIGENOUS SOLIDARITY NETWORK RETHINKING “THANKSGIVING” TOOLKIT Artwork by Kandi White, Indigenous Environmental Network, CultureStrike and Micah Bazant INTRODUCTION For many Indigenous People, giving thanks is a way of life. Among the Haudenushonne (Iroquois) Nations an opening address, or...

item.title: A fantastic collection of Native-owed businesses to replace your...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

A fantastic collection of Native-owed businesses to replace your Black Friday shopping and to share with family and friends for those who are gathering today.

About Native American fashion, clothing, and jewelry.

beyondbuckskin.com

BUY NATIVE LIST

About Native American fashion, clothing, and jewelry.About Native American fashion, clothing, and jewelry.
item.author: SURJ Denver

item.title: Overnight “camping,” long lines, aggressive shoppers,...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Overnight “camping,” long lines, aggressive shoppers, mistreated and underpaid customer service workers, crowds of people during a pandemic…

This Black Friday skip all of that and join Denver Alliance for Street Health Response to support a community meal and fundraiser for our unhoused neighbors and acknowledge the direct contrast between “camping” to support capitalism and “camping” because of capitalism.

Contact DASHR directly to support with the meal or show up on-site with survival gear that could include socks, warm hats, tents, tarps, hand warmers, etc.

FRI, NOV 26

Black Friday-Free

11th and Lincoln, Denver2 people went
item.author: SURJ Denver

item.title: Friends!! The amazing families at Sanctuary4All Colorado are...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver is at Metro Caring. · Denver

Friends!! The amazing families at Sanctuary4All Colorado are making delicious food for Thanksgiving! You can order Tamales, Pozole, and 4 different types of dessert - Pumpkin Pie, Chocoflan, Spring Fling Cupcakes, and Champurrado. I have tried everything on the menu and it's ALL AMAZING. Support and advocate for immigrant families in Colorado by ordering now https://solidaritythanks.paperform.co. Pickup in Denver on Thursday 11/25 at 1PM at Metro Caring 1100 E. 18th Ave.

Imag...e Description 1: Purple background with festive green and orange leaves. "Thanksgiving Dinner.
Sanctuary4All Families want to cook for you for Thanksgiving. Pickup in Denver Nov. 25 at 1:00
solidaritythanks.paperform.co"

Image Description 2: Purple background with festive green and orange leaves. "Tamales by the Dozen
Verdes con Pollo $24 - filled with salsa verde and chicken
Rojos con Puerco $24 - filled with salsa roja and pork
Rajas con Queso $24 - filled with peppers, onions, and cheese
Venmo @yessenia-martinez-25"

Image Description 3: Purple background with festive green and orange leaves. "Pozole Verde y Rojo
Chicken Pozole Verde $15 - Soup made with chicken, tomatillos, hominy, radishes, and lime
Pork Pozole Rojo $15 - Soup made with pork, tomatoes, hominy, radishes, and lime
Venmo @gabriela-miranda-42 for pozole verde and @guadalupe-carmona-4 for pozole rojo"

Image Description 4: Purple background with festive green and orange leaves. "Thanksgiving Dessert
Pumpkin Pie $15 - Classic Thanksgiving pumpkin pie
Chocoflan $25 - Flan topped with chocolate cake and berries
Spring Fling Cupcakes 6 for $30 - Zucchini-based cupcakes with cream cheese frosting
Champurrado $5 - A warm corn-based chocolate drink
Venmo @guadalupe-carmona-4 for pumpkin pie, spring fling cupcakes, and champurrado. Venmo @yessenia-martinez-25 for chocoflan"

item.title: This Saturday 11/20 Jeanette Vizguerra, the founder of...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver is at Metro Caring. · Denver

This Saturday 11/20 Jeanette Vizguerra, the founder of Sanctuary4All Colorado, is selling enchiladas! Her case is ongoing, and she’s faced particular challenges due to retaliation from ICE and DHS for her activism. You can support by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co Pick up Saturday in Denver at Metro Caring 1100 E. 18th Ave 1PM-3PM!

Image Description 1: Jeanette Vizguerra

Image Description 2: Beige background with orange and red shapes and fall leaves.

...

"Enchiladas from Jeanette
Green Enchiladas $15 With rice and salad
Red Cheese Enchiladas $15 With rice and salad

solidaritymeals.paperform.co
Pickup in Denver November 20 1:00-3:00
Venmo @Sanctuary-4-All

Instagram logo @sanctuary4allco
Twitter logo @sanctuary4allco
Facebook logo Sanctuary4All Colorado"

item.author: SURJ Denver

item.title: Thank you for your contributions!
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Thank you for your contributions!

Celestial Alegría

Community once again we did it! Together raised another $5,000 for the #CelestialAlegria #ReparationsNetwork ✨🖤✊🏽

This means that since July 2020 we have raised... a total of $20,000 for reparations through this grassroots community funded action! This Friday we will have paid $500 to 40 Black leaders, artists, healers, organizers and community organizations! We did this together!

Just wow! I really hope you take some time to celebrate with me today because this is powerful! This is what community and solidarity action looks like! Thank you for everyone who gave, who amplified what we are up to and who took time to learn more about why reparations are so necessary for us to build a world where Black Lives Matter!

#DefendBlackLives #BLM #BlackLivesMatter #AllBlackLivesMatter #BlackLiberation #ConfrontAntiBlackness #BlackAndBrownUnity #Solidarity #RacialJustice #CollectiveCare #Joy #Transformation #Healing #GoalMet #WeDidIt #Fundraiser #Complete #Celebrate

See more
item.author: SURJ Denver

item.title: We’re $600 away from Celestial Alegría’s $5,000 goal! If we...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

We’re $600 away from Celestial Alegría’s $5,000 goal! If we all chip in $1, $5, $10, we’ll reach this goal! Spread the word💛

Celestial Alegría

We need to make #reparations a reality for our Black siblings now! Since slavery, Black siblings have called for reparations as an clear form of action.

When p...eople ask me why I created the #CelestialAlegria #ReparationsNetwork it is because I listened to Black siblings, particularly Black women and femmes, demanding this form of action.

This grassroots community funded action is about creating our own system of collective care that centers Black leaders, healers, artists, organizers and organizations. This is about organizing our resources and taking ongoing action. We are $2,070.34 away from our goal of $5,000 by November 15th. At the end of this cycle we will have raised $20,000 and paid $500 to 40 beautiful Black beings and Black led organizations in our community. Every dollar counts! Take action today via Venmo @Celeste-Martinez-129 or PayPal.Me/CelestialAlegria

#DefendBlackLives #BLM #BlackLivesMatter #AllBlackLivesMatter #BlackLiberation #ConfrontAntiBlackness #BlackAndBrownUnity #Solidarity #RacialJustice #CollectiveCare #Joy #Transformation #Healing

See more
item.author: SURJ Denver

item.title: Lupe is selling Gorditas and Champurrado this Saturday 11/13...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Lupe is selling Gorditas and Champurrado this Saturday 11/13 with Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals! She’s recovering from a double surgery to treat kidney cancer and a hernia, and she’s unable to work as much as usual. Please support her by ordering some of her delicious Gorditas!! Pick up in Denver at Metro Caring on Saturday from 1PM to 3PM. https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

Image Description:
Pink and grey graphic design background with text that reads

...

"Beef Gordita $15 - With ground beef and potatoes. With a side of rice, beans, salad, and salsa.
Veggie Gordita $15 - With sliced pepper and cheese. With a side of rice, beans, salad, and salsa.
Champurrado $5 - Chocolate and corn base drink.

solidaritymeals.paperform.co
Pickup in Denver Nov. 13 1:00-3:00
Venmo Guadalupe-Carmona-4

Instagram logo @sanctuary4allco
Twitter logo @sanctuary4allco
Facebook logo Sanctuary4All Colorado"

item.title: Let's get Celestial Alegría 's Reparations Network to...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Let's get Celestial Alegría 's Reparations Network to $5k over the next 5 days! Please donate, like, and share so that the Reparations Network can reach its goal of $20,000 for its funding cycle and ensure that 40 incredible Black community leaders, artists, and healers each receive $500 in funding support!

As our Confronting White Supremacy series comes to a close (week 10 is next week!), we ask you all to support this important work as part of our ongoing shared commitment to Black liberation. Thank you so much to all of you who have made financial contributions, reshared posts on social media and in...

mailchi.mp

Celestial Alegría Reparations Network - 5 days to Reach $5K

As our Confronting White Supremacy series comes to a close (week 10 is next week!), we ask you all to support this important work as part of our ongoing shared commitment to Black liberation. Thank you so much to all of you who have made financial contributions, reshared posts on social media and in...As our Confronting White Supremacy series comes to a close (week 10 is next week!), we ask you all to support this important work as part of our ongoing shared commitment to Black liberation. item.content:encoded:

Motus Theater's JustUs: Stories from the Frontlines of the Criminal Justice System monologue performance is coming up this Saturday 11/13 - You don't want to miss witnessing these powerful stories. Get your tickets today & help spread the word!

item.title: Community - Please contribute to this as soon as possible. Any...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Community - Please contribute to this as soon as possible. Any amount - it all adds up! Continue to spread the word about Celestial Alegría’s #ReparationsNetwork. Share this info with 3 people today!

Celestial Alegría

#CelestialAlegria #ReparationsNetwork Update! We are $2,828.49 away from our goal of $5,000 by November 15th!

Together we are creating a system of collective ...care that centers Black leaders, healers, artist and organizations in our community ✨🖤✊🏽

Give any amount via Venmo @Celeste-Martinez-129 or PayPal.Me/CelestialAlegria
Continue to spread the word about this community funded action!

item.title: Gaby is selling tacos, flautas, and cheesecake this Saturday...
item.content:encoded:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver is at Metro Caring. · Denver

Gaby is selling tacos, flautas, and cheesecake this Saturday 11/6 with Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals program. All funds will go directly to her and her family. Pickup in Denver at Metro Caring from 1PM-3PM. I've had Gaby's tacos, flautas, and cheesecake - they are all DELICIOUS! My family especially loves the potato tacos. Please share, support, and place your orders now! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co/

Image Description:

Pink and green flyer with black text ...that reads

"Solidarity Meals from Gaby
Tacos Dorados de Papa $15 - Golden potato tacos served with rice and salad (vegetarian)

Flautas de Pollo $15 - Chicken filling wrapped in a corn tortilla and fried served with rice and salad

Tarta de Queso $5 - Slice of cheesecake

solidaritymeals.paperform.co/
Pickup in Denver November 6, 1:00-3:00
Venmo Gabriela-Miranda-42"
